cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7240, READ Act Reauthorization Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 54 (Monday, March 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BASS:
H.R. 7240.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 1 of the United States Constitution,
providing--``All legislative Powers herein granted shall be
vested in a Congress of the United States, which shall
consist of a Senate and House of Representatives.''
[Page H3896]

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 613.

title: READ Act Reauthorization Act of 2022
